t: Jeremiah 1
The*p words of Jeremiah the son of Hilkiah, of the priests who were*i in Anathoth in the land of Benjamin,
to whom the word of the Lord*s came in the days of Josiah the son of Amon, king of Judah, in the thirteenth year of his reign.

It came also in the days of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah, king of Judah, until the end of the eleventh year of Zedekiah the son of Josiah, king of Judah, until the carrying away of Jerusalem captive in the fifth month.
The Prophet Is Called
Then*p the word of the Lord*s came to me, saying:
“Before*pn I formed you in the womb I knew you; Before*ld you were born I sanctified you; I*ld ordained you a prophet to the nations.”
Then*p said I: “Ah,*pn Lord God!*s Behold,*ld I cannot speak, for I am*i a youth.”
But*p the Lord*s said to me: “Do*pn not say, ‘I am*i a youth,’ For*ld you shall go to all to whom I send you, And*ld whatever I command you, you shall speak.
Do*ld not be afraid of their faces, For*ld I am*i with you to deliver you,” says the Lord.*s
Then*p the Lord*s put forth His hand and touched my mouth, and the Lord*s said to me: “Behold,*pn I have put My words in your mouth.
See,*ld I have this day set you over the nations and over the kingdoms, To*ld root out and to pull down, To*ld destroy and to throw down, To*ld build and to plant.”
Moreover*p the word of the Lord*s came to me, saying, “Jeremiah, what do you see?” And*p I said, “I see a branch of an almond tree.”
Then*p the Lord*s said to me, “You have seen well, for I am ready to perform My word.”
And*p the word of the Lord*s came to me the second time, saying, “What do you see?” And*p I said, “I see a boiling pot, and it is facing away from the north.”
Then*p the Lord*s said to me: “Out*pn of the north calamity shall break forth On*ld all the inhabitants of the land.

For*ld behold, I am calling All*ld the families of the kingdoms of the north,” says the Lord;*s “They*ld shall come and each one set his throne At*ld the entrance of the gates of Jerusalem, Against*ld all its walls all around, And*ld against all the cities of Judah.
I*ld will utter My judgments Against*ld them concerning all their wickedness, Because*ld they have forsaken Me, Burned*ld incense to other gods, And*ld worshiped the works of their own hands.
“Therefore*ln prepare yourself and arise, And*ld speak to them all that I command you. Do*ld not be dismayed before their faces, Lest*ld I dismay you before them.

For*ld behold, I have made you this day A*ld fortified city and an iron pillar, And*ld bronze walls against the whole land— Against*ld the kings of Judah, Against*ld its princes, Against*ld its priests, And*ld against the people of the land.
They*ld will fight against you, But*ld they shall not prevail against you. For*ld I am*i with you,” says the Lord,*s “to deliver you.”
